title: What are the philosophical contributions of Albert Einstein? - Quora

response.answer_text: He thought that everything in the physics of the universe should be able to be simply stated. That's why he tried to reconsile quantum physics into something easily understandable. Unfortunately quantum physics is not easily understandable. It is also his greatest strength as a physicist, he was able to explain the universe in simple terms, E=MC2 and so on… Unfortunately he thought that there could be no real magic to the universe's workings which quantum physics clearly is!
